course_title: Pediatric Primary Care NP Practicum V
course_description: This clinical course fully integrates the primary care of children that are well, acutely ill, or chronically ill with healthcare policy and change. Emphasis is on the transformation of health care within a primary care setting.
prerequisites: NRSG 823D and NRSG 824D as prerequisites, NRSG 825D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 5230, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
